content.text:
# Manava (king)

Manava was the son and successor to the previous King of Gauda, Shashanka. He was the last recorded ruler of the dynasty and was likely deposed by Harshavardhana (King of Kannauj) or Bhaskaravarman (King of Kamarupa). He ruled as king for 8 months 5 days during 625â€“626.
See also
*List of rulers of Bengal
